attributes.action: Close the borders and start a program of mass deportation of illegal migrants
attributes.background: The new USA Trump administration has started mass deportation of illegal immigrants. Hopefully they will deport as many as President Obama who deported 3 million such people. The German government has voted to close the borders to illegal migrants. We should follow these good examples.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for similar actions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700824
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/703195
